title: That Girl Lay Lay
overview: Lay Lay is the embodiment of fierceness, with optimism, magnetism, style, and swagger to boot. She was once Sadie Alexander's virtual hype avatar, but now she's come to life on a wish! Free to live as a real girl, Lay Lay wants to experience everything that comes with being a teenager. With Sadie as her best friend there is nothing that can stop these two from bringing their unique brand of friendship to their everyday adventures.
